channel.title: Port Foward/Utorrent
channel.description: yeah so ive portfowarded and everything with linksys its a wrt model or w.e. ive had 20+ ppl try helping on team view and cross loop trying to port foward right.... even utoreent doesnt work for me?

item.title: Port Foward/Utorrent
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

Hi Lemon,
There are some problems.
1.There are posted thouzend of topics about this. use the search buttom
2.uttorent is not a good trussted program(in my case)
3.So i would do the following portforward ur linksys good and only open applications and gamings NAME:moparscape 43594 43594 then ur port u can find with ipconfig,
4.go to ur windows(IF ur using windows) firwal and portforward name moparscape port 43594. then check ur agf/panda/Norten (or whatever u got) and look if there is a firewal on there when u follow these steps [CORECTLY] then ur computer (router) wil be portforwarded
goodluck
Reverce

Read full topic
